text: Rohit is a given name, usually for males. It is mostly used in India. The word "rohit" refers to the color red. It is derived from Sanskrit, meaning "the first rays of the sun". The early morning sunlight usually has a reddish tint. This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). == People == * Rohit Sharma, Indian cricketer * Rohit Chopra, American government official * Rohit Shetty, Indian film director and producer ==References== Category:Given names
title: Rohit
